data.author: Bulent Nizamoglu
data.description:
BN Calender! 

Calender is on your watchface now! 

This watchface contains the following features:
- Calender (Day, Weekday, Month information)
- Battery percentage
- Bluetooth connection notification
- Location & temperature info
- Temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit
- Color configuration

You can edit background color, text color, background color of the current day & background color of the current weekday. 
Also you can switch between Celsius & Fahrenheit! 
You can use BN Calender watchface for both 12/24 hour formats also you can choose to show/hide AM/PM indicator for 12 hour format!

After installing BN Calender you will have 48 hours of trial period. You can explore its features and enjoy it. If you like and want to keep it after the trial period, you can buy BN Calender for just $0.99.
When trial period ends, you will be prompted to follow some very easy steps and pay for the BN Calender. If you buy it you will have the watchface permanently! (As long as you use the same Pebble account.)
data.title: BN Calender

data.description: Flex is designed to be a customizable watch face. It comes with various available fonts and widgets. Elements can be resized and repositioned. data.author: CameronPak

changelog.release_notes:
- Step count updates every minute or whenever the user shakes the device.
- Updated icon.

data.description:
Too many times I find myself being ruled by the clock. I would feel anxiety after subconsciously glancing at my watch for the time. That would then project my thoughts into "what is next" mode, instead of...

Being here, now. 

See what matters most when you need it. Shake the watch to intentionally see the time and date.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Step count updates every minute or whenever the user shakes the device.
- Updated icon.

data.author: astosia

changelog.release_notes: Release 2.0 gives you three options of weather provider, OpenWeatherMap, DarkSky (aka forecast.io) and Weather Underground.  Any problems, please get in touch!

Fixed problem with very low temperatures incorrectly word wrapping.  
Changed so now No vibe on BT disconnection if Watch is in quiet time mode.
Hopefully fixed problem of long city names overlapping other things.
Fixed slight error on rotate position

data.description:
Phoenix is a rotated watchface showing current weather information (temperature, conditions and wind speed) through the centre of the watchface.

Also shows steps (for Pebble Time and Pebble 2).

Anti-aliased time font.

Inspired by Taller, chrono twist axis, 7egment and DIN Time!
 
 Features:
 - Auto-detection of 12h/24h based on your watch settings
 - Auto-translation of weekday supported for:
 English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Italian.
- Location, Sunset, Date and Battery complications
 
 Options:
 - Choose background and text colours 
 - Weather: 
  - Current conditions icon and current temperature in °C or °F, wind speed in knots, kph, mph or ms
  - Forecast conditions and high/low temperatures in °C or °F, wind speed in knots, kph, mph or ms
 - Weather powered by Weather Underground,
DarkSky (aka forecast.io), or
OpenWeatherMap
Weather requires an api key to work (links on the settings page for the watchface).
 - Implementation of pmkey.xyz
 - Location, based on your selected weather provider (DarkSky shows lat, long, others show location name)
 - Bluetooth disconnect vibe warning and icon (no vibe in quiet time)
 - Optional night theme colours between sunset and sunrise

Order of vertical elements, from top down is:
- current wind speed
- current wind direction (direction wind is coming from)
- current temperature
- current conditions icon
- forecast high temperature
- forecast conditions icon
- forecast low temperature
- average forecast wind direction
- average forecast wind speed

Make complications the same colour as the background to hide them

latest_release.release_notes: Release 2.0 gives you three options of weather provider, OpenWeatherMap, DarkSky (aka forecast.io) and Weather Underground.  Any problems, please get in touch!

data.title: phoenix 270°

data.description:
90° DIN is a customizable watchface that shows current weather information (temperature, conditions and wind speed in knots) at 90 degrees vertically through the centre of the watchface.

Also shows steps (for Pebble Time and Pebble 2).

Inspired by Taller, chrono twist axis, 7egment and DIN Time!
 
 Features:
 - Auto-detection of 12h/24h based on your watch settings
 - Auto-translation of weekday supported for:
 English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Italian.
- Location, Sunset, Date and Battery complications
 
 Options:
 - Choose background and text colours 
 - Weather: Current conditions in °C or °F, wind speed in knots
 - Choose your weather provider (api keys needed):
 -- Wunderground
 -- OpenWeatherMap
 - Implementation of pmkey.xyz
 - Location, based on your selected weather provider
 - Bluetooth disconnect vibe warning and icon
 - Optional night theme displayed between sunset and sunrise

data.description:
A simple, but stylised digital watchface with the hours above the minutes.  The day of the week (English only) appears at the bottom. 

Foreground and background colors are configurable.


Screenshots:
1. 10:56, Saturday
2. 09:48, Friday
3. 12:37, Wednesday


This design was created by László Scheffer, from Hungary, and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio.  It is published with his permission. 

The original design can be found here:  
https://blog.tokyoflash.com/2011/08/11/easy-to-read-e-ink-watch-design-in-anodised-aluminium/

data.author: Super Yeh
data.description:
This watchface is to express weather information (including hourly data of cloud rate, precipiation, temperature and AQI) as funny figure, showing as a picture of a city. Right now it is only support the weather resource in China。 

这是一个将天气预报资料图象化的表盘。 
采用了每小时预测共48小时(2天)资料。
预测的资料图象化后，随着时间由右向左移动，到达现在所处的时间(以太阳或月亮的位置表示)。
data.title: Weather Earth

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
The “undercover” digits are formed by starting with classic digits, stretching the top part, and pulling it down slightly as a “cover” over the bottom part.  

Foreground and background colors are configurable.


Time shown: 06:25


This design was created by Heather Sable Villano, from USA, and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio.  It is published with her permission. 

The original design can be found here:
https://blog.tokyoflash.com/2011/10/19/undercover-led-digits-in-disguise/
data.title: Undercover

data.author: stosem

changelog.release_notes: v 2.0 + add option for showing current note

data.description:
What is the sound of Time?
Now you can see it.

The first piano row is for showing hour. Bottom - minutes.
Black keys - for the first digit of number (ten, twenty,...). White keys - second digit (one, two,..). One octave has 7 notes (1-7) and C, D (8-9) from second one.
If no keys colorized - it means zero.
 
In screenshots it is 13:00, 7:25, 14:40

This face can also detect a watch status by showing icons:
- b (bemolle) - when bluetooth lost.
- d (eighth note) - quiet time.
- # (diesis) - on low battery.
- o (whole note) - on charging.

From v.2.0 it has option for showing current notes (last screenshot).

Support round and rectangle screen.

latest_release.release_notes: v 2.0 + add option for showing current note

data.title: Piano

data.author: stosem
data.description:
Zen time is eternal NOW.

But you can also read approximate mental time by detecting position of zen-circle (hour) and dot around this circle (minute).
In screenshots it is a 11:00, 6:45, 3:30. 

To feel presence better you can set auto-vibrate interval (10-60 min). 

This face can also detect a watch status by displaying words:
- "silence" on quiet time,
- "void" on low battery,
- "freedom" when connection lost,
- "power" on charging.

Additionaly it has a extrimely power saving mode (refreshing only central part of screen once at 5 minutes).

You can continue live in stress. Always be in a standby mode and every time check a watch. 
But there is another way. The Event model. And Pebble provide full set of features for it.

Zen Time watchface philosophy:
- Live in a continuous NOW.
- Don't track a time.
- If you plan events - make an early reminder in a calendar/alarm and don't wait it.
- If you want to see a date - install "Today is" app in a top. Press middle button.
steps - press Up button.
weather - move Weather app in a top. Press middle button.
battery level - move Settings in a top. Press middle button.
- Use timers in everyday life.
- Install "Breathe" or "Respire" app to make a better practice.
data.title: Zen Time

data.author: Heinakroon
data.description:
A minimalist and futuristic take on a classic analogue watch face, with the hour hand displayed inside a disc obscuring the centre of the face. Hour / 5-minute markers makes the external minute hand easier to read.

Today's date is displayed in the centre.
data.title: Unified

data.author: Heinakroon

changelog.release_notes: Version 2 with correct hardware support info.

data.description:
Sector is a digital take on an analogue 24-hour watch face. Each sector is filled as soon as that hour or minute is reached, with the PM hours filling inner sectors, the AM hours the middle sectors and the minutes the small outer ones. 

Today's date is shown in the centre dot.

First screenshot shows 8:23 and the second 16:43.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 2 with correct hardware support info.

data.title: Sector

data.description:
Analog Watchface with weather and health data.
Features:
- Support rectangle and round display.
- White or black theme.
- Bluetooth, QuietTime, Charge icons.
- Display steps.
- Battery indicator.
- Weather with temperature (C/F), wind speed and direction.
- You can set vibrate interval (10-60 min).
- Vibrate if bluetooth lost.
- Support languages: English, Russian.

Based on "Perfect Analog" watchface by JakeRusch.
Thanks to JohnEdwa for W800 font.

2.0.1
+ Vibrate on BT lost flag
* Fix memory leak

Simple design watchface showing hour and minutes, now in color for Pebble Time originally By Jnm.

Tap or twist your wrist to sequentially display the date, the battery percentage, the phone connection status, steps and the time in digits.

Use the configuration screen from the Phone App to choose the date format, language and color.

data.title: Karateka

data.author: b123400
data.description:
The angle of the half circle indicate the hour. The percentage of the half circle filling up indicate how much time is passed in this hour. Keep in mind that it's filling up the area instead of a perpendicularly linearly growing, which means you should find it hard to guess the exact time. This watch face is not meant to be accurate, but to let you feel the time.

This is inspired by the SPLITTMM watch face by Albert Salamon.

Ok, so everyone knows pebble is dead. But I love it and I make this watchface just because I want to use.
data.title: Partial

And it's a Moon none the less :)

Star Wars themed Watchface, using the Death Star to show the moonphase.

The numbers beneath the time are steps today and seconds of sleep today.

Other features are:
- Vibration on bluetooth dis-/reconnect
- Red time on bluetooth disconnect
- Battery Status (the blue bars)
- Date nd Weekday
- Weekday also at the bottom of the screen, written in Aurebesh

data.description:
And it's a Moon nonetheless :)

Star Wars themed Watchface, using the Death Star to show the Moon phase.

The numbers beneath the time are steps today and seconds of sleep today.

Other features are:
- Vibration on Bluetooth dis-/reconnect
- Red time on Bluetooth disconnect
- Battery Status (the blue bars)
- Date and Weekday
- Weekday also at the bottom of the screen, written in Aurebesh

V2:
- added Configuration Page
- added 3 more Images to choose from
- steps count and sleep seconds can now be disabled by choosing the StarWars Logo image
- Battery meter color can be set

V2.1:
- added possibility to change time format of sleep duration from seconds to minutes:seconds or hours:minutes:seconds

data.author: BV Designs
data.description:
Shows time in slide rule format, date and current temperature with weather conditions. Thanks to Nev for his assistance!

The time appears in 12 or 24 hour mode depending on your watch settings. The word "OFF" appears when bluetooth is disconnected. Vibrations with each connection status.

Manual weather option and Master Key (pmkey.xyz) support.  Configurable date format, temperature unit and colour or invert options.
data.title: Slide Time

data.author: MiniMax
data.description:
# Pokétch++

Pokétch++ is a fork of metakirby5 Pokétch+

## Last release features :
- Add configuration for bluetooth vibration

## Features:
- Pebble Round support
- Pebble Time color support
- Color inversion for day/night
- Date (with current day)
- Battery bar on lower right
- Pikachu charging image when watch is charging
- "!" to left of Pikachu when bluetooth disconnected
- Vibrate when bluetooth disconnected

## Future releases :
- Add steps count
- Add configuration to switch day / night colors
- Add configuration to show seconds instead of date
- Choose the date format (MM DD or DD MM)
- Days in french (And maybe other languages)
- Add the weather on the top of the watchface
- ... if you have some ideas contact me
data.title: Pokétch++

data.author: kesuiket

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
Cryptic digital watchface .  Each strange looking figure in the display is a digit shown with its shadow in the same color. 

The colors are configurable.

Screenshots: 09:25, 06:47, 12:59, 10:38 

This design was created by Lloyd King, from UK, and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio.  It is published with his permission. 

The original design can be found here: 
https://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/02/17/shadows-lcd-watch-lifts-time-out-of-the-shade/
data.title: Shadows

data.author: Christophe Jeannette
data.description:
This watchface use the hands to display additional information.

The white part of hours hand display the battery.

The white part of the minutes hand display the steps (0->8000) or the sleep duration (4h->8h) depending on your activity.

Screen 1 : 60% battery, 0 steps.
Screen 2 : 30% battery, 6000 steps (or 7 hours of sleep)
data.title: SmartHands

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
Digital clock face that displays the time using what appears to be Morse code.

Just ignore the dots and the remaining dashes form 4 digits giving the time.

Displays in 12 or 24-hour mode depending on Fitbit profile settings.

The colors are configurable.

Screenshots 10:34, 12:57

This design was created by Lloyd King, from UK, and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio.  It is published with his permission. 

The original design can be found here: 
https://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/07/04/encryption-lcd-watch-with-morse-code-style-display/
data.title: Encryption

data.author: Daniel Cerezo
data.description: This is a funny watchface about Felynes of monster hunter. You can see temperature on the green bar, and day on the yellow bar. Arrows say the time, red for hours and white for minutes. Its based on the original timer from the game in PSP version. It also vibrates on bt disconnection. Hope you like it! Its FREE :)

data.author: pikaring

changelog.release_notes:
This watch face displays the price of virtual currency such as bit coin in real time.
With the API provided by Zaif you can select the currency you want to display from 28 different currency pairs.
We plan to improve automatic transactions.

--
このウォッチフェイスはビットコインなどの仮想通貨の価格をリアルタイムで表示します。
Zaifが提供するAPIにより２８種類の通貨ペアの中から表示したい通貨を選択できます。
自動取引ができるよう改良する予定です。

data.author: krtonga

changelog.release_notes:
In this release:
- Fixed date display error. Was displaying "February" instead of "February 1"

This release includes:
- Removing vibration on creation of window (so as not to vibrate unnecessarily when switching between applications)
- Code clean-up

v1.0
- "TicToc" inspired watchface with icon to show whether bluetooth is connected (	💗) or not (💩)
- When bluetooth change is detected icon changes and watch vibrates (short pulse for reconnected, 5000 millisecond pulse for disconnect)

data.description:
This watchface was inspired by my absent minded tendency to leave my phone behind when I'm in a hurry. I wanted to be informed when bluetooth disconnects, so I can turn around immediately and go back for my mobile. 

The face was inspired by the TicToc watchface, with one main difference. When bluetooth is disconnected, the watchface triggers a hard to mistake, quite long vibration, and a poo icon. When bluetooth is reconnected, the face shows a heart.

latest_release.release_notes:
In this release:
- Fixed date display error. Was displaying "February" instead of "February 1"

data.title: NoLostPhone

improved dial accuracy and hand order

data.description:
A classic watch face inspired by a Cartier Tank watch. Includes full day, date and second hand. Sub dial for battery charge and a bluetooth connection indicator (the I numeral changes to white filled when connection is lost and the watch vibrates).
Use settings to choose light or dark theme and whether or not to display seconds hand.
Blue hands on light background, yellow hands on dark background.

data.author: Bulent Nizamoglu

changelog.release_notes: BN Digital is live again and it is configurable now!
BN Digital is live again and it is configurable now!

data.description:
BN Digital watchface is configurable now! 

You can edit background color, time layer color, date & weather text color, time color! 
Also you can switch between Celsius & Fahrenheit! 
You can use BN Digital watchface for both 12/24 hour formats also you can choose to show/hide AM/PM indicator for 12 hour format!

This watchface contains the following features:
- Date
- Day of the week
- Battery percentage
- Bluetooth connection notification
- Weather & temperature info
- Weather icon
- Step Counter
- Sleep information
- Temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit
- Color configuration

After installing BN Digital you will have 48 hours of trial period. You can explore its features and enjoy it. If you like and want to keep it after the trial period, you can buy BN Digital for just $0.99.
When trial period ends, you will be prompted to follow some very easy steps and pay for the BN Digital. If you buy it you will have the watchface permanently! (As long as you use the same Pebble account.)

latest_release.release_notes: BN Digital is live again and it is configurable now!

data.title: BN Digital

data.author: Frank Schenke

changelog.release_notes: you can now set a sleepgoal. in the morning the progressbar now shows how's your sleeping compared to your average sleep.

data.description:
+++ now supporting english & german ++++
Übersichtliches Watchface mit Schrittziel-(und Schlafziel-)anzeige als Fortschrittsbalken. Die Durchschnittsschrittzahl für den aktuellen Wochentag wird zum direkten Vergleich als extra Markierung angezeigt.

Wetter via yahoo, WeatherUnderground oder Openweathermap.
Bei fehlender Bluetoothverbindung wird statt des Wetters der Batteriestand angezeigt.

Bei weniger als 1000 Schritten wird die Schlafdauer der letzten Nacht angezeigt.

***********  Donations are welcome (for Paypal -> Websitelink)  ***********

latest_release.release_notes: you can now set a sleepgoal. in the morning the progressbar now shows how's your sleeping compared to your average sleep.

data.title: bY

data.author: KristofWillen
data.description: Life's hard, so you need some motivation talk to get you through the day. Or not ? As the balance in the universe must be steady, this watchface also sports some demotivational quotes. Just to keep you with both feet on the ground. (De)motivational quotes are displayed around an outer circle, while the inner circle shows information like date, battery & step count. The circle gaps make the hour and minute hands. Disclaimer : this watchface is for shits and giggles. Don't take anything personal. Any resemblance with your personal life is mere conincidence. This watchface uses the fctx compiler/library of JRMobley, so credit to him.
data.title: D-Motivation

data.author: C.Guy

changelog.release_notes: 凌晨1~7点自动进入省电模式（5分钟更新一次表盘）

data.description:
There is a watchface for my pebble time steel with my Samsung S8.Just my first project that I made.
When the power less than 10% will display "DYING!".Disconnecting with your phone will display "DISCONNECT!"
Just run on PTS I had tried.
就是一个为了跟我的S8息屏效果搭配的表盘，超省电，我的PTS能待机用上10天。
为了防止以后自己找不回这个安装包，丢到app store上面去吧。
第三行15xxxxxxxx的数字是一个时间戳，程序里用来表示时间的单位，程序员装逼用...

latest_release.release_notes: 凌晨1~7点自动进入省电模式（5分钟更新一次表盘）

data.author: Corrivatus
data.description:
Emacs on your Pebble! 

This is a simple scratch buffer, complete with mode line and menu bar. The time piece is based off of (display-time-mode 1) elisp.

Currently only compiled for Basalt (Pebble Time), but if there's a demand for a port I'll be happy to make one, just email me at Corrivatus@gmail.com and let me know.
data.title: Emacs
